items: Hi! im IQlvlZero and heres a bit about me

and i hated every second of making this site!

items.text:
NOW, In the ultimate bout of Extreme Lazinessi will not be putting any buttons on this site as that would take to much work
ive been working on the same damn song for months now but all my creative juices are dying
soive been hoping that i can just make it work out in the end
but i dont think i will be.
